altername_name: The Shadow Of The Third Moon
name: The Shadow of the 3rd Moon
overview: The Shadow of the 3rd Moon is a game developed by Black Blade and was released for Commodore Amiga in 1997. It is a flying shooter where you can choose to steer with the mouse or keyboard/joystick or a combination of both. Sader , anno 854. The Kieer are invading our territories. This is the first contact since the Big Cataclysm. Tharaic-Neht, the third moon of Salder, fatherland of the Kieer's now darkens our sky. Most of our troops are moving to the Alken base. We hope that a quick response to the enemy troops may avoid the threatening bloody ware that now seems so close. Fly out and engage enemy air forces and good luck!
